metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47516 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the libsofia-sip fork in drachtio-server before 0.8.20. It allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a crafted UDP message that leads to a failure of the libsofia-sip-ua/tport/tport.c self assertion.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsofia-sip-ua-glib3 - 1.12.11+20110422.1+1e14eea~dfsg-4ubuntu1
libsofia-sip-ua0 - 1.12.11+20110422.1+1e14eea~dfsg-4ubuntu1
sofia-sip-bin - 1.12.11+20110422.1+1e14eea~dfsg-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sofia-sip package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.12.11+20110422.1+1e14eea~dfsg-4ubuntu1').
